presets.name: Run iOS on a device with udid
Run `pod install` before building iOS app

xcodeConfiguration.description: Explicitly set the Xcode configuration to use.
xcodeConfiguration.x-deprecated: Use `mode` instead. Deprecated from @react-native-community/cli. Will be removed in Nx 17.

simulator.description: Explicitly set simulator to use. Optionally include iOS version between parenthesis at the end to match an exact version: "iPhone 6 (10.0)"

mode.description: Explicitly set the scheme configuration to use

schema.description: Explicitly set Xcode scheme to use

device.description: Explicitly set device to use by name. The value is not required if you have a single device connected.

udid.description: Explicitly set device to use by udid

verbose.description: Do not use xcbeautify or xcpretty even if installed

port.description: The port where the packager server is listening on.

buildFolder.description: Location for iOS build artifacts. Corresponds to Xcode's "-derivedDataPath". Relative to ios directory.

interactive.description: Explicitly select which scheme and configuration to use before running a build

extraParams.description: Custom params that will be passed to xcodebuild command.

install.description: Runs `pod install` for native modules before building iOS app.

sync.description: Syncs npm dependencies to `package.json` (for React Native autolink).

binaryPath.description: Path relative to project root where pre-built .app binary lives.
